Package com.cafean.utils

Class NrcDBUnits

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.utils.NrcDBUnits
  • public class NrcDBUnits
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to provide a data structure to hold labeling and units conversion for an NRC Databank data channel.
    See Also:
    NrcDBConv

      java.lang.String yaxisTitle
      The descriptive label typically used for a Y-axis lable.

    • Field Detail

      • eucodeTyp

        public int eucodeTyp
        The type of engineering units code (0==SI, 1==British).

      • yaxisTitle

        public java.lang.String yaxisTitle
        The descriptive label typically used for a Y-axis lable.

      • unitsSI

        public java.lang.String unitsSI
        SI unit label.

      • unitsBritish

        public java.lang.String unitsBritish
        British unit label.

      • convFactor

        public double convFactor
        The conversion factor. If eucodeTyp==0 this is the SI to British conversion factor, if eucodeTyp==1 this is the British to SI conversion factor

    • Constructor Detail

      • NrcDBUnits

        public NrcDBUnits​(int ecVal,
                  int ecTyp,
                  java.lang.String yaxis,
                  java.lang.String unDefault,
                  java.lang.String unAlt,
                  double cf)
        Engineering unit code constructor.
        Parameters:
        ecVal - The engineering unit code.
        ecTyp - The type of engineering units code (0==SI, 1==British).
        yaxis - The descriptive label typically used for a Y-axis lable.
        unDefault - The default units label (ecTyp==0 ->SI, ecTyp==1 ->British).
        unAlt - The alternate units label (ecTyp==0 ->British, ecTyp==1 ->SI).
        cf - The conversion factor.

    • Method Detail

      • getConvFactor

        public double getConvFactor​(boolean useSI)
        Return the conversion factor for this engineering unit code.
        Parameters:
        useSI - If true, return the factor required to convert to SI, If false, return the factor required to convert to British.
        Returns:
        The conversion factor.

      • convertValue

        public double convertValue​(boolean useSI,
                           double val)
        Convert a value to the requested units.
        Parameters:
        useSI - If true return value in SI units, else return british.
        val - The value to convert.
        Returns:
        The value in the requested units.

      • getLabel

        public java.lang.String getLabel()
        Return the descriptive label for this engineering unit code.
        Returns:
        The descriptive label.

      • getYLabel

        public java.lang.String getYLabel​(boolean useBritish)
        Return the Y-axis label for this engineering unit code. This corresponds to the descriptive label followed by the units label enclosed in parenthesis.
        Parameters:
        useBritish - If false, return the Y-axis label with SI units, If true, return the Y-axis label with British units.
        Returns:
        The conversion factor,

      • getUnits

        public java.lang.String getUnits​(boolean useBritish)
        Return the units label.
        Parameters:
        useBritish - If false, return the SI units label. If true, return the British units label.
        Returns:
        The units label.
